author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: يا إِلهِي بِعَظَمَتِكَ الكبْرَى عَنْ كُلِّ ما يَكْرَهُهُ رِضاكَ، وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ مَوْلاهُ وَمَوْلَى العالَمِينَ.
translation: Keep him safe also, O my God, by the power of Thine immeasurable majesty, from all that Thou abhorrest. Thou art, verily, his Lord and the Lord of all worlds.
